name: Mysterious Town (coralito)
description:
Game made by Wenpei Sun for DATT 3300 Link of Game Document:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YQQJ1XlpyXnxf5w23Fs6IMfcVjjdmPoSLJZ9TqfNXSk/edit?usp=sharing

Intro

Mysterious Town is a role-playing game. Try to talk to the witch to get the secret formula and make the potion you want that can make people feel happy!

Controls

Use "W" "A" "S" "D" key to move.

Use "Shift" key to run.

Use "Space" to jump.

Use "E" to pick up items in your hands.

Use "F" to interact & put the things in your backpack.

How to Play

Walk around in the town and enjoy the relaxed atmosphere.

Talk to the witch to get the recipes and follow her instructions!

Walk around to find everythings you need in the town!
